enchantment.immersiveagriculture.farmer_: Provides a better yield from harvesting crops
immersiveagriculture.tooltips.farm_tile: §7An upgraded version of the vanilla Farmland. Enables fertilizers. Right click fertilizers to increase the fertilization level of the tile
immersiveagriculture.tooltips.fertilizer:
§7Fertilizer can be used on "Farm Tiles" and "Hydroponic Tiles" to increase fertilization level in the tiles 
It can also be used in the fertilization station to automatically fertilize the tiles
immersiveagriculture.tooltips.hydroponic: §7An upgraded version of Farm Tiles, allow player to put fluids inside the tile in order to meet the requirement of some crops. Shift right-click the block to check contained fluids
immersiveagriculture.tooltips.sprinkler: §7The Sprinkler works in a %sx%1$s§7 range, moistures farmlands in range when provided water and power. Shift right-click the block to check contained fluids. Can be disabled by giving a redstone signal
immersiveagriculture.tooltips.watering_c: §7Watering can be filled by shift-right click water source blocks. When used around farmland blocks it will moisture the block and boost crop growth speed for a tiny bit
